overview: 1882, Canton. Huguang Chamber of Commerce organizes a tournament to compete for the right to cooperate with the British merchant Brown. Liang Kuan comes to the ring to stand up for his younger brother, but it is a conspiracy by the British merchant Brown. The British came to China for the purpose of creating a "war machine". Wong Fei Hong appeared in time to save Liang Foon
title: Return of Wong Fei Hung
